Grading

Upload your Element Collages via this Dropbox link!

  • If you received between 40–60 points you followed directions, created lots and lots of different elements, and visually explored a lot of different options for each individual element.
  • If you received between 20–39 points you mostly followed directions, created some different elements, and visually explored some different options for each individual element.
  • If you received between 0–19 points you did not follow directions, create lots of different elements, or visually explored a lot of different options for each individual element.
